text: Nandao ren lei juede qiguai ma? Wo yi qishi [zhu] tamen zhong de yi wei nanzi [mu sheng]:“Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao renlei, ni dang xiang xinshimen baoxi, tamen [xinshi] zai tamen de zhu [an la] nali bi jiang huode shangong de huibao.” Dan bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe que shi yi wei mingxian de moshu shi.”
